name: __ESamplerSourceMode
doc: Controls where the sampler for different texture lookups comes from

SSM_FromTextureAsset: Get the sampler from the texture.  Every unique texture will consume a sampler slot, which are limited in number.
SSM_Wrap_WorldGroupSettings: Shared sampler source that does not consume a sampler slot.  Uses wrap addressing and gets filter mode from the world texture group.
SSM_Clamp_WorldGroupSettings: Shared sampler source that does not consume a sampler slot.  Uses clamp addressing and gets filter mode from the world texture group.
SSM_TerrainWeightmapGroupSettings: Shared sampler source that does not consume a sampler slot, used to sample the terrain weightmap.  Gets filter mode from the terrain weightmap texture group.
